title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
description: three-panel huipil, broad white and red striped ground, red stripes have very fine interior warp stripes in yellow; shoulder area is primarily red, with fine weft stripes in yellow and supplementary weft patterning in blue, purple, yellow, orange and green; pattern consists of geometric motifs, diamonds, chevrons, etc.
creditline: Gift of Roberta and Richard Simmons
